about_the_game:
Vistas 3 Book

This Vistas 3 book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The third of its kind, this DLC offers even more of the scenery, landscapes, and forests you love!

Contents

The Vistas 3 book unlocks the following images:
  • Lonely Mountain - 52x27
  • Blood Moon - 60x60
  • Mount Fuji - 80x80
  • Camping 100x100
  • Hiking - 106x106
  • Ravine - 112x202
  • Starry Night - 120x120
  • Sunburnt - 120x120
  • Boreal - 120x200
  • Seasons - 122x122
  • Retro - 125x122
  • Apocalypse - 150x150
  • Farm - 150x150
  • Watchtower - 150x150
  • Waterside - 152x102
  • Meteor - 182x122
  • Eden - 200x200
  • Sunset - 250x175
  • Moonlight - 302x152
  • Holy Lake - 302x202

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Vistas 3 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
